<h3 id="X39809">X(39809) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-EXCENTERS-REFLECTIONS TO 7th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^8-6*(b^2+c^2)*a^6+3*(b^2+c^2)^2*a^4+2*(b^4-3*b^2*c^2+c^4)*(b^2+c^2)*a^2-(3*b^4-4*b^2*c^2+3*c^4)*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39809) = 3*X(3)-4*X(6722) = 2*X(3)-3*X(23514) = 3*X(4)-X(99) = 4*X(4)-X(10992) = 5*X(4)-X(13172) = 6*X(5)-5*X(31274) = 4*X(5)-3*X(38748) = 2*X(99)-3*X(114) = X(99)+3*X(10723) = 4*X(99)-3*X(10992) = 5*X(99)-3*X(13172) = X(114)+2*X(10723) = 5*X(114)-2*X(13172) = 8*X(6722)-9*X(23514) = 4*X(10723)+X(10992) = 5*X(10723)+X(13172) = 5*X(10992)-4*X(13172) = 5*X(31274)-3*X(38738) = 10*X(31274)-9*X(38748) = 2*X(38738)-3*X(38748)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(3)</p>
<p>X(39809) lies on these lines: {2,38736}, {3,6722}, {4,99}, {5,31274}, {20,6036}, {24,39831}, {25,39812}, {30,115}, {33,39815}, {34,39822}, {98,3146}, {146,148}, {147,17578}, {183,32152}, {185,39806}, {235,39816}, {376,14061}, {378,39825}, {381,620}, {382,2794}, {543,3830}, {546,33813}, {548,34127}, {549,15092}, {550,38737}, {671,9862}, {690,12295}, {1498,39810}, {1569,14881}, {1593,39828}, {1597,13175}, {1656,38731}, {1657,38224}, {1699,11724}, {2407,8754}, {2482,3845}, {2782,3627}, {2790,38956}, {3044,14157}, {3091,6721}, {3098,33017}, {3529,20398}, {3534,5461}, {3839,12117}, {3843,15561}, {3851,38750}, {3853,14981}, {5059,38735}, {5066,9167}, {5073,11623}, {5076,13188}, {5477,21850}, {6054,20094}, {6564,8997}, {6565,13989}, {6795,35903}, {7517,39854}, {7970,9812}, {8597,19924}, {8703,14971}, {8724,38335}, {9166,11001}, {10113,15357}, {10352,14068}, {10728,10769}, {11361,19130}, {11381,39817}, {11403,39803}, {11424,39805}, {11439,39807}, {11455,39808}, {11470,39819}, {11471,39821}, {11473,39823}, {11474,39824}, {11475,39829}, {11476,39830}, {11632,15684}, {11710,28164}, {11711,18483}, {11725,18481}, {12101,15300}, {12324,39804}, {12943,13183}, {12953,13182}, {14269,35022}, {14645,18440}, {14651,33703}, {14830,36523}, {15359,16111}, {15482,37348}, {15535,34584}, {15690,26614}, {15704,38229}, {15811,39820}, {17800,38742}, {18534,39857}, {19108,23259}, {19109,23249}, {19124,39811}, {19169,39814}, {19416,39826}, {19417,39827}, {19709,22247}, {29012,35377}, {31723,39847}, {32458,32819}, {34981,35345}</p>
<p>
X(39809) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4, 10723}, {98, 3146}, {148, 10722}, {382, 6321}, {671, 15682}, {5073, 38741}, {6033, 38733}, {10728, 10769}, {11381, 39817}, {11632, 15684}<br>
X(39809) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (20, 6036), (98, 38734), (114, 4), (115, 22515), (185, 39806), (1569, 14881), (1657, 38747), (2482, 3845), (3534, 5461), (5477, 21850), (6055, 9880), (10992, 114), (11711, 18483), (13188, 38745), (14830, 36523), (14981, 22505), (15300, 22566), (15357, 10113), (16111, 15359), (18481, 11725), (22505, 3853), (22566, 12101), (33813, 546), (38730, 620), (38738, 5), (38741, 11623), (38749, 115), (39838, 3627)<br>
X(39809) = anticomplement of X(38736)<br>
X(39809) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (5, 38738, 38748), (20, 14639, 6036), (115, 22515, 9880), (115, 38749, 6055), (148, 3543, 10722), (381, 38730, 620), (546, 33813, 36519), (1657, 38224, 38747), (3091, 21166, 6721), (3830, 38733, 6033), (5073, 38732, 38741), (9880, 38749, 115), (33813, 36519, 38751), (38732, 38741, 11623)<br>
</p>
